sentences.en: Add Glitter, Graphics , and Comments to personalize your images, then share with your friends!
sentences.cn: 添加闪烁 、 图形 、 注释、个性化的您跟朋友分享!

sentences.en: Can view and personalize portal site content and create sites.
sentences.cn: 可以查看和自定义门户网站的内容并创建网站.

sentences.en: Compete in three different game modes and completely personalize your own player.
sentences.cn: 参加三个不同的游戏模式,完全个性化自己的球员.

sentences.en: How you create or personalize your character.
sentences.cn: 如何创建或选择你的角色.

sentences.en: In addition, you can personalize to harden in the packaging.
sentences.cn: 此外还可以个性化地在包装上加固.

sentences.en: Personalize the from and reply - to addresses for notification e - mail .
sentences.cn: 请设置通知 电子邮件 发件和答复地址的个人化设置.

sentences.en: Select the items you want to personalize, then choose how you want the new items created.
sentences.cn: 选择要个性化的项目, 然后选择如何创建新项目.

sentences.en: Send faxes to a group of people. You can personalize the fax that each person receives.
sentences.cn: 将传真发送给一组人. 您可以单独设置传真的格式.

sentences.en: Send letters to a group of people. You can personalize the letter that each person receives.
sentences.cn: 将信函发送给一组人. 您可以单独设置信函的格式.

sentences.en: Sometimes you can personalize a choice with your own words.
sentences.cn: 有时您可以使用自己的语言使选项个人化.

sentences.en: Users could tweak their PCs in various ways to personalize them.
sentences.cn: 用户可以用各种方式来调整自己的PC,实现个性化.

sentences.en: We don't want to personalize the issue.
sentences.cn: 我们不想把问题搞得个人化了.

sentences.en: Why not do something to personalize your office?
sentences.cn: 为什么不做点什么使你的办公室有些个性呢？

sentences.en: You can personalize standard documents by adding a few sentences in your own language.
sentences.cn: 你可以在标准文档中加入一些你自己的语言,使文档的语言具有个人特色.

sentences.en: You can personalize these forms and record them.
sentences.cn: 你可以个性这些表格并记录他们.

sentences.en: You can personalize your installation by specifying your company information.
sentences.cn: 您可以通过指定您的公司信息来个人化安装.

words.tran_cn: 亲自地；当面；个别地；就自己而言
人事消息栏；人称代名词
人格化；化身；拟人法（一种修辞手法）；象征
个性化（personalize的过去式）；个人化

trans.tran_en: to put your name or  initial s  on something, or to decorate it in your own way, to show that it belongs to you

trans.tran_cn: 在（某物上）作物主标志（尤指表示物主的地址或姓名的首字母），使（某事物）针对个人、带有个人感情或个性化，在（物品）上标出姓名（记号），使…拟人化
trans.tran_en: to put your name or  initial s  on something, or to decorate it in your own way, to show that it belongs to you
